name: The Way Home (itch) (concode)
description:
I removed submit this game from the GMTK 2021. 

Except for the theme part of this game, much of it comes from an existing game in development. GTMK can use existing code or art, but I thought it might not be fair, as some people pointed out, as there are many things from the existing game in dev. I love my game, so I don't want this game to be controversial.

 Anyway, thank you very much to everyone who played my game and left feedback. I had a lot of doubts about myself, but just by enjoying this game, I could at least feel that I was developing on the right path. 

Many thanks :D

The Way Home. (for GMTK 2021)

  • The doggy and harness are implemented during the GMTK21
  • The other part is my pre-existing
Instructions
  • Move: WASD or Arrow Key
  • Action for the target: 'M' key or mouse click
